properties.name: Albuquerque, NM
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Albuquerque, new MexicoI know, you\'re not driving, Diane, but I wanted to put you on the map as well.

properties.name: Baton Rouge, LA
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Baton Rouge, LA

properties.name: Branford, CT
properties.description: Posted by Ginna197869 church street, branford, CtHey, Kel... I put you on the map so you would be able to get to PA with no probs. Directions: 1: Start out going EAST on CT-146 / MAIN ST toward CEDAR ST.

properties.name: CNBC
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Englewood Cliffs, NJIf you are coming from Jersey I just put in Englewood Cliffs and you can work it out from there. I know it\'s far but it will be worth the effort! Directions: 1: Start out going SOUTHWEST on RAYMOND ST toward LORETTA CT.

properties.name: Cincinatti, Ohio
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Loveland, OHif you are coming from Ohio and you just happen to not know how to get to Lewistown... here is a map!

properties.name: Clarion Inn Burnham
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978 13015 Ferguson Valley Road, Burnham, PA, 17009The Clarion Inn is a nice hotel that has a decent bar and restaurant. There will be transportation provided to the guests from here to the ceremony/reception.

properties.name: Crowley and other Louisiana Locations
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Crowley, LAJust thought I would generalize the rest of you by marking Crowley. If you are driving to Pa, this should make things easier.

properties.name: Dragon fly Inn
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978 rr1, Honey Grove, paThis is an amazing little B&B with 5 rooms and ambiance to spare! If you want to make a weekend of your trip to Central PA and take our picturesque area this is the place to stay. It is a bit farther from the ceremony/reception and you will have to provide your own transportation but well worth it in the end.

properties.name: Green Gables Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978 900 South Main St, Lewistown, PA, 17044Green Gables Hotel is a newly renovated Inn, one of the closest to the ceremony/reception that we will transportation transportation.

properties.name: Houston, TX
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Houston, TXI know some of you are coming from Houston and if you are driving, this may come in handy

properties.name: Ladder 43/ Engine 53
properties.description: Posted by Ginna19781836 3rd Ave, New York, NYDirections from the firehouse. If you are coming from work, which some of you may be, here is how you go to Lewistown from there.

properties.name: Lily Manor
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Hc 67, Mifflin, PA, 17058Lily Manor is where the ceremony/reception will be held. Below are the directions you will need to get there: 322 Traveling East or West to Mifflintown Exit - Route 35 head South on Route 35, 6.2 miles Lily Manor is brick mansion on right.

properties.name: Mom and Dad's House
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978 210 Cliffside Drive, Lewistown, PAFeel Free to stop by here at any point during the weekend. There will be food and booze in abundance. A post-reception party will also be held here for all the guests.

properties.name: Mom and Dad's House
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978210 Cliffside drive, Lewistown, PAFeel free to call my parents at any time with anything you may need. 717-242-1998.

properties.name: New Orleans, LA
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978New Orleans, LAIt\'s a far way but worth the effort. Paul, you\'d better be there.

properties.name: New York City- Upper West Side
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978515 West 111th St, New York, NYIf you are leaving from the Upper West Side, follow this map.

properties.name: Philadelphia, PA
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Philadelphia, PAThis is for you, Elisha and Ben! I know you know where you\'re going but I am in love with this program and it is fun marking places on the map! Directions: 1: Start out going EAST on S PENN SQ toward S BROAD ST / AVENUE OF THE ARTS / PA-611. <0.1 miles Map 2: Turn LEFT onto S JUNIPER ST. 0.1 miles Map 3: Turn LEFT onto JOHN F KENNEDY BLVD. 1.0 miles Map 4: Turn RIGHT onto SCHUYLKILL AVE / PA-3 W. <0.1 miles Map 5: Merge onto I-76 W toward VALLEY FORGE (Portions toll). 97.2 miles Map 6: Merge onto I-283 N via EXIT 247 toward HARRISBURG / HERSHEY. 3.9 miles Map 7: I-283 N becomes I-83 N / US-322 W. 3.0 miles Map 8: Merge onto I-81 S / US-322 W via EXIT 51A on the LEFT toward CARLISLE / LEWISTOWN. 2.4 miles Map 9: Merge onto US-22 W / US-322 W via EXIT 67 toward LEWISTOWN. 52.0 miles Map 10: Merge onto US-22 toward US-22 W / LEWISTOWN. 2.8 miles Map 11: Turn SHARP RIGHT onto W MARKET ST. 0.2 miles Map 12: Enter next roundabout and take 2nd exit onto E MARKET ST. 0.2 miles Map 13: Turn SLIGHT RIGHT onto CHESTNUT ST. <0.1 miles Map 14: End at Lewistown, PA US Map Total Est. Time: 2 hours, 51 minutes Total Est. Distance: 163.22 miles

properties.name: Pittsburgh, PA
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Pittsburgh, PAIf you are coming from Pittsburgh, check this out. Directions: 1: Start out going SOUTHWEST on GRANT ST toward OLIVER AVE. 0.2 miles 2: Merge onto I-376 E / US-22 E toward MONROEVILLE. 13.9 miles 3: Merge onto US-22 E / WILLIAM PENN HWY via the exit on the LEFT toward MURRYSVILLE. 76.1 miles 4: Merge onto I-99 N / US-220 N via the exit on the LEFT toward ALTOONA. 24.8 miles 5: Turn RIGHT onto US-220 / APPALACHIAN TRWY. 11.5 miles 6: Merge onto US-220 N / US-322 E toward STATE COLLEGE / LEWISTOWN. 4.7 miles 7: Merge onto US-322 E toward BELLEFONTE / US-322-BUS / ATHERTON ST.. 35.1 miles 8: Take the exit toward US-522 N / WALNUT ST.

properties.name: Plano, Dallas, TX Area
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Plano, TXWe couldn\'t forget our Dallas guests.

properties.name: Rose House Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978 617 Washington Ave, Mifflintown, PAThis is a cute little bed and breakfast providing 3 rooms. It is very close to the ceremony/reception although if you stay here you will be required to provide your own transportation.

properties.name: St. Louis, Missouri
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978St. Louis, MissouriThis is for you, Michelle... you\'d better fly! Driving would be insane

properties.name: Tuxedo, NY
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Tuxedo, nyA lot of you will be coming from Tuxedo or other areas Upstate. This will help you get to the boonies of PA.

properties.name: Washington DC
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Washington, DCI know there are a few of you out there... Directions: 1: Start out going SOUTHWEST on ELLIPSE RD NW toward 16TH ST NW. 0.2 miles 2: Turn LEFT onto 16TH ST NW.

properties.name: marietta, GA
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Marietta, GAOlivia, if you think you can get here and I know it\'s far, here is a map to help.
